name.description: Name of the rate plan (e.g., 'Standard Rate', 'Non-Refundable Rate')

description.description: Detailed description of the rate plan

basePriceModifier.description: Modifier for the base price (e.g., 0.9 for 10% discount, 1.1 for 10% premium)

minNights.description: Minimum number of nights required for this rate plan

maxNights.description: Maximum number of nights allowed for this rate plan

validFrom.description: Date from which this rate plan is valid

validTo.description: Date until which this rate plan is valid

status.description: Status of the rate plan (e.g., ACTIVE, INACTIVE) - will be an enum later
